attributes.action: amend the Law that prevents people from being legally married outside in the United Kingdom
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Make it legal in some controlled circumstances to marry outside in the United Kingdom. The place should be approved, if suitable for such an event, by both the local authorities and a nominated governing body which would then result in a licence being issued on an inidividual basis for a fee.
